results.title: Bushwick
results.overview: In a Brooklyn neighborhood, 20-year-old Lucy and war veteran Stupe must cross a treacherous five blocks to escape an invading military force.

results.title: Birth of the Dragon
results.overview: Set against the backdrop of San Francisco’s Chinatown, this cross-cultural biopic chronicles Bruce Lee’s emergence as a martial-arts superstar after his legendary secret showdown with fellow martial artist Wong Jack Man.

results.title: Shot Caller
results.overview: A newly-released prison gangster is forced by the leaders of his gang to orchestrate a major crime with a brutal rival gang on the streets of Southern California.

results.title: Sivaranjiniyum Innum Sila Pengalum
results.overview: Sivaranjiniyum Innum Sila Pengalum (English: Sivaranjini and a few more women) is an upcoming Indian Tamil anthology film directed by Vasanth. The film contains three female-centric short stories written by writers Jeyamohan, S. Ramakrishnan and Ashoka Mithran. The film features Padmapriya, Parvathy and Pooja Kumar in the lead roles, while Karunakaran plays a supporting role. Featuring music composed by Sudha Raghunathan, the film began production in early 2015.

results.title: A Gentlemen
results.overview: Gaurav dreams of settling down with Kavya, the woman of his dreams, but she prefers a man who's more adventurous and willing to take risks. He soon stands to lose everything when a case of mistaken identity rocks his once-happy life.

results.title: Kidnap
results.overview: Single mother Karla McCoy lives a perfect life with her young son Frankie. One day, upon entering a local park, Karla sees her son suddenly being abducted out of the blue by a kidnapper. To save Frankie from being taken, Karla goes out on a mission to demand people in the city to help rescue her son.

results.title: The Nut Job 2: Nutty by Nature
results.original_title: The Nut Job 2: Nutty by Nature
results.overview: When the evil mayor of Oakton decides to bulldoze Liberty Park and build a dangerous amusement park in its place, Surly Squirrel and his ragtag group of animal friends need to band together to save their home, defeat the mayor, and take back the park.

results.title: All Saints
results.overview: ALL SAINTS is based on the inspiring true story of salesman-turned-pastor Michael Spurlock (John Corbett), the tiny church he was ordered to shut down, and a group of refugees from Southeast Asia. Together, they risked everything to plant seeds for a future that might just save them all.

results.title: Crown Heights
results.overview: When Colin Warner was wrongfully convicted of murder, his best friend Carl King devoted his life to proving his innocence.

results.title: Damned Summer
results.overview: Idling afternoons, drugs, heartbreaks, psychedelic moods immersed in music. An adrenaline rush. Lisbon as the backdrop for a drifting youth.

results.title: The Life and Death of John Gotti
results.original_title: The Life and Death of John Gotti
results.overview: John Gotti rises to the top of the New York underworld to become the boss of the Gambino crime family. His life takes a tumultuous turn as he faces tragedy, multiple trials and a prison sentence.

results.title: Sekigahara
results.overview: A movie adaptation of a novel based on the Battle of Sekigahara. The famous battle determined the ruler for Japan and marked the beginning of the rise of the Tokugawa shogunate.

results.title: Mudbound
results.overview: In the post–World War II South, two families are pitted against a barbaric social hierarchy and an unrelenting landscape as they simultaneously fight the battle at home and the battle abroad.

results.title: Science Fiction Volume One: The Osiris Child
results.original_title: Science Fiction Volume One: The Osiris Child
results.overview: Set in the future in a time of interplanetary colonization, an unlikely pair race against an impending global crisis and are confronted by the monsters that live inside us all.

results.title: Meteors
results.overview: They come at night and everybody steps out. They light torches and remember those who have walked these streets before them. In the coming hours, the city wil be on lockdown: an eclipse appears and meteors start to fall.

results.title: Scary Mother
results.overview: A 50-year-old housewife, Manana, struggles with her dilemma - she has to choose between her family life and her passion, writing, which she had repressed for years - she decides to follow her passion and plunges herself into writing, sacrificing to it mentally and physically.

results.title: The Circle
results.overview: A young tech worker takes a job at a powerful Internet corporation, quickly rises up the company's ranks, and soon finds herself in a perilous situation concerning privacy, surveillance and freedom. She comes to learn that her decisions and actions will determine the future of humanity.
